languages.text: {n}Лицо Ардженты озаряется внутренним пламенем.{/n} "Ты считаешь себя избранным для миссионерства? А знаешь ли ты, какие тяготы выпадают на долю несущих слово Его? Неверные не падут на колени от одних речей — сколько праведников погибло от рук тех, кого они пытались спасти! В чуждых мирах есть и другие враги: болезни, голод, лишения. Малейший изъян в вере — и они сломают тебя, отвратят от Трона. Ты считаешь себя достойным превозмочь испытания?"

{n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'illumine.{/n} « Vous pensez avoir été choisi pour devenir missionnaire ? Savez-vous quels obstacles se dressent sur la voie de ceux qui tentent de répandre la parole de l'Empereur ? Les mots à eux seuls ne suffisent pas à faire tomber les incroyants à genoux. D'innombrables hommes et femmes de valeur sont morts des mains de ceux qu'ils essayaient de sauver ! Et il y a bien d'autres dangers qui guettent ceux qui s'aventurent dans les mondes lointains : la maladie, la faim, la misère... La moindre faille dans votre foi risque de vous briser et de vous détourner du Trône. Pensez-vous réellement avoir la force de surmonter toutes ces épreuves ? »
languages.original_text: {n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'illumine.{/n} « Vous pensez avoir été choisi pour devenir missionnaire ? Savez-vous quels obstacles se dressent sur la voie de ceux qui tentent de répandre la parole de l'Empereur ? Les mots à eux seuls ne suffisent pas à faire tomber les incroyants à genoux. D'innombrables hommes et femmes de valeur sont morts des mains de ceux qu'ils essayaient de sauver ! Et il y a bien d'autres dangers qui guettent ceux qui s'aventurent dans les mondes lointains : la maladie, la faim, la misère... La moindre faille dans votre foi risque de vous briser et de vous détourner du Trône. Pensez-vous réellement avoir la force de surmonter toutes ces épreuves ? »

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se enciende.{/n} «¿Cree que ha sido elegido para la labor de un misionero? ¿Acaso es consciente de las penurias que padecen los portadores de Su palabra? La elocuencia no le bastará para hacer que los infieles se postren de rodillas. ¡Un sinfín de hombres y mujeres de intachable virtud han perecido a manos de aquellos a los que pretendían salvar! Y hay otros enemigos al acecho en los mundos más apartados. Enfermedad. Hambre. Pobreza. La más leve carencia en su fe bastará para sucumbir a ellos y renegar del Trono. ¿Cree tener lo que hace falta para superar esas adversidades?».
languages.original_text: {n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se enciende.{/n} «¿Cree que ha sido elegido para la labor de un misionero? ¿Acaso es consciente de las penurias que padecen los portadores de Su palabra? La elocuencia no le bastará para hacer que los infieles se postren de rodillas. ¡Un sinfín de hombres y mujeres de intachable virtud han perecido a manos de aquellos a los que pretendían salvar! Y hay otros enemigos al acecho en los mundos más apartados. Enfermedad. Hambre. Pobreza. La más leve carencia en su fe bastará para sucumbir a ellos y renegar del Trono. ¿Cree tener lo que hace falta para superar esas adversidades?».

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的面孔被内心的烈焰照亮。{/n}“你相信是祂选中了你，要求你去传教吗？你明白那些宣扬祂的真理之路的人们，都要遭受什么样的苦难吗？只靠言语的力量，根本没办法让那些无信之人跪倒在祂的面前。无数心怀正义的善男信女，最终却死在了他们试图拯救的那些人手中！还有很多其他敌人潜伏在众多遥远的世界，你要面对的还有疾病、饥荒、贫困。但凡你的信仰有一丁点微小的瑕疵，你都会被敌人击垮，离黄金王座的信仰越来越远。你认为，你有能力克服这些挑战吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的面孔被内心的烈焰照亮。{/n}“你相信是祂选中了你，要求你去传教吗？你明白那些宣扬祂的真理之路的人们，都要遭受什么样的苦难吗？只靠言语的力量，根本没办法让那些无信之人跪倒在祂的面前。无数心怀正义的善男信女，最终却死在了他们试图拯救的那些人手中！还有很多其他敌人潜伏在众多遥远的世界，你要面对的还有疾病、饥荒、贫困。但凡你的信仰有一丁点微小的瑕疵，你都会被敌人击垮，离黄金王座的信仰越来越远。你认为，你有能力克服这些挑战吗？”

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの顔に内なる炎が灯る。{/n}「聖務団の仕事のお陰で選ばれたとでも？主の言葉を伝える者が、どんな苦難に耐えなければならないか知っているのか？言葉だけでは、信念を持たないものに信じさせることはできない。助けようとしていた人々のせいで、大勢の正義の男や女が死んでいった。辺境の世界には他の敵も潜んでいる。病気、飢餓、それに貧困。信念に少しでも欠陥があったら、あなたを批判し王座から遠ざけるだろう。それでも、あなたにはこのような試練に打ち勝つ力があると思いますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの顔に内なる炎が灯る。{/n}「聖務団の仕事のお陰で選ばれたとでも？主の言葉を伝える者が、どんな苦難に耐えなければならないか知っているのか？言葉だけでは、信念を持たないものに信じさせることはできない。助けようとしていた人々のせいで、大勢の正義の男や女が死んでいった。辺境の世界には他の敵も潜んでいる。病気、飢餓、それに貧困。信念に少しでも欠陥があったら、あなたを批判し王座から遠ざけるだろう。それでも、あなたにはこのような試練に打ち勝つ力があると思いますか？」

languages.text: {n}Ein inneres Feuer lässt Argentas Gesicht erstrahlen.{/n} "Ihr glaubt, Ihr seid auserwählt, als Missionar zu dienen? Wisst Ihr, welche Mühsal die Verbreiter seiner Botschaft erdulden müssen? Worte allein werden die Ungläubigen nicht auf die Knie fallen lassen. Unzählige rechtschaffene Männer und Frauen sind durch die Hände derer gestorben, die sie zu retten versucht haben! Und auf abgelegenen Welten lauern auch andere Feinde. Krankheiten. Hunger. Entbehrung. Der kleinste Makel in Eurem Glauben reicht aus, damit sie Euch brechen und Euch vom Thron abwenden. Glaubt Ihr, Ihr habt das Zeug, diese Herausforderungen zu überwinden?"
languages.original_text: {n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"

Wisst Ihr, welche Mühsal die Verbreiter seiner Botschaft erdulden müssen? Worte allein werden die Ungläubigen nicht auf die Knie fallen lassen. Unzählige rechtschaffene Männer und Frauen sind durch die Hände derer gestorben, die sie zu retten versucht haben! Und auf abgelegenen Welten lauern auch andere Feinde. Krankheiten. Hunger. Entbehrung. Der kleinste Makel in Eurem Glauben reicht aus, damit sie Euch brechen und Euch vom Thron abwenden. Glaubt Ihr, Ihr habt das Zeug, diese Herausforderungen zu überwinden?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzünde içten gelen bir ateş hissediliyor.{/n} "Misyonerlik görevi için seçildiğine inanıyorsun, öyle mi? O'nun kelâmını taşıyanların katlanmak zorunda oldukları zorlukları biliyor musun? İnançsızlara diz çöktürmek için yalnızca kelimeler yetmez. Kurtarmaya çalıştıklarının elinde sayısız inançlı erkek ve kadın can vermiştir! Ücra dünyalarda başka düşmanlar da kol gezer. Hastalık. Açlık. Mahrumiyet. İnancındaki en ufak bir kusur bunların seni parçalaması ve Taht yolundan etmesi için yeterli olur. Bu zorlukların üstesinden gelme yetisine sahip olduğuna inanıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: {n}An inner fire lights up Argenta's face.{/n} "You believe you have been chosen for missionary work? Do you know what hardships the bringers of His word must endure? Words alone will not make the faithless fall to their knees. Countless righteous men and women have died at the hands of those they were trying to save! Other foes lurk on remote worlds as well. Disease. Hunger. Destitution. The smallest flaw in your faith will be enough for them to break you and turn you away from the Throne. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome these challenges?"
